name: High Roller (Ryanb2505, necrosaint, Theonlyrio)
description:
The heist is on!

The High Roller has broken into the vault at Ace's Casino and now he needs to make a break for it. Can he escape through the 8 rooms of the casino before the guards overwhelm him?

Control the higher roller using the mouse. Select actions from the dice at the bottom. Click on the tiles to move or attack.  Each turn the Highroller must move one square and can choose to launch one of three random attacks from his dice bag.

Rotate the attack by aiming at different tiles with the mouse. 

Guards will move toward you and try to steal your dice.

Defeat the guards, and escape through the doors in each stage!

Run out of dice and the jig is up: you've been caught!

For the best experience, play the standalone build.

Credits:

Rio Kisjantoro, 3D Art, 2D Art
Ryan Baylis, Music, SFX
James Lucas, Programming
